pages.text: While usually not of any power, $(item)Occult Paraphernalia$() are still nice to have around.$(br)They usually serve as simple decoration, but they may sometimes help with things beyond $(o)the ambiance$().

$(item)Murals$() are simple objects of worship finely carved from a material. They are usually found in $(ml:miskatonicmysteries:world/shrines)$(marked)Shrines$() and always dedicated to a Great Old One.$(br)$(o)Some might find them to look quite suspicious.$()

$(item)Idols$() are more complex objects of worship and almost always found in $(ml:world/shrines)shrines$().$(br)Much like $(item)Murals$(), they are dedicated to a Great Old One.$(br)Unlike Murals, they are actually of slightly supernatural nature. Worshippers find a lot of power in them, especially after rest.

pages.title: Altars
pages.text: $(item)Altars$() are lectern-like objects made of a mundane material, from stone to coral to blackstone, adorned with candles and inlaid with $(ml:miskatonicmysteries:world/occult_artifacts#gold)$(item)Oceanic Gold$().$(br)Altars can be used to hold this book or similar grimoires.
